Version history,Version History makes collaborating in Vev even more secure by providing a complete record of all the changes made to your projects throughout their lifetime. It's a great tool for going back in time to see how designs have evolved and recovering past nuggets of the copy. Acting as your team's creative memory  it ensures nothing is ever permanently overwritten or lost. Use this history to:Copy any previous content to the presentView changes made by whoRestore pages from an earlier version Read more about the feature here
